TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PnrpPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PnrpPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PnrpPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type PnrpPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 指定使用於 物件權限的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that are used in object permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設權限會允許所有的本機和內部網路區域的應用程式存取 PNRP 服務。The default permissions allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access PNRP services. 如果預設的權限都沒有變更，所有連結本機以及網站本機應用程式都能夠存取對等服務，但全域 （網際網路） 應用程式沒有存取權。If the default permissions are not changed, all link-local and site-local applications have access to Peer-to-Peer services, but global (internet) applications have no access. 此類型的執行個體有兩種權限狀態： 他們沒有存取權的權限所保護的資源，或是它們不受限制的完整存取這些資源。Instances of this type have two permission states: they either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public PnrpPermission (System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed
Public Sub New (state As PermissionState)
public: PnrpPermission(System::Security::Permissions::PermissionState state);
new System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission : System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState -> System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission

span.span: One of the values in the enumeration.

summary.span: 使用提供的初始權限狀態初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the supplied initial permission state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型的執行個體有兩種權限狀態： 他們沒有存取權的權限所保護的資源，或是它們不受限制的完整存取這些資源。Instances of this type have two permission states: they either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources. 如果`state`是不受限制、 PnrpPermission 執行個體將傳遞所有的需求。If `state` is Unrestricted, the PnrpPermission instance passes all demands. 如果`state`包含任何其他值，PnrpPermission 執行個體失敗的所有要求。If `state` contains any other value, the PnrpPermission instance fails all demands.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前 的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current .

returns.span: 具有 IPermission 介面的物件，其執行個體內含 的目前執行個體複本。

span.span: An object with an IPermission interface, whose instance contains a copy of the current instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. 此類型的執行個體有兩種權限狀態： 他們沒有存取權的權限所保護的資源，或是它們不受限制的完整存取這些資源。Instances of this type have two permission states: they either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources.

param.name: e
param.span: 用來重新建構權限的 XML 編碼。

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.

summary.span: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

span.span: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表用於編碼安全性物件的 XML 物件模型。Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects. 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited. 這個類別被要為簡單 XML 物件模型以便使用於安全性系統，而不做為一般的 XML 物件模型的輕量型實作。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model.

Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Intersect(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前使用權限 的使用權限。

span.span: A permission to with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前 和指定之使用權限交集而成的使用權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 新的使用權限，表示目前 和指定之使用權限的交集。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，則這個新的使用權限是 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 下列陳述式必須是`true`Intersect 方法的所有實作的。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Intersect method. X 和 Y 代表不是物件參考`null`參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。X and Y represent object references that are not a `null` reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). - X.Intersect(X) 傳回值等於 X。X.Intersect(X) returns a value equal to X. - X.Intersect(Y) 傳回 Y.Intersect(X) 相同的值。X.Intersect(Y) returns the same value as Y.Intersect(X). - X.Intersect (`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)) 會傳回`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。X.Intersect(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

exception.span: 目標參數不是 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，而且不是和目前使用權限物件相同類別的執行個體。

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前 是否為指定之使用權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的 是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前是所指定權限的子集，如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含在指定的權限的作業。The current is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，代表權限的權限 」*C:\example.txt*「 」 表示存取權限的子集*c:\\*"。For example, a permission that represents access to "*C:\example.txt*" is a subset of a permission that represents access to "*C:\\*". 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 下列陳述式必須是`true`IsSubsetOf 方法的所有實作的。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the IsSubsetOf method. X、 Y 和 Z 代表不是物件`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。X, Y, and Z represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - 傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(X) `true`。X.IsSubsetOf(X) returns `true`. - X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 傳回 Y.IsSubsetOf(X) 相同的值，如果且只有 X 和 Y 代表相同的權限集。X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns the same value as Y.IsSubsetOf(X) if and only if X and Y represent the same set of permissions. - 如果兩者都傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 和 Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`，傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`。If X.IsSubsetOf(Y) and Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) both return `true`, X.IsSubsetOf(Z) returns `true`. - 如果 X 表示空白 IPermission 物件權限狀態為*無*和 Y 代表 IPermission 物件`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)，傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) `true`。If X represents an empty IPermission object with a permission state of *None* and Y represents an IPermission object that is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns `true`. 如果 Z 也是空的權限，複合設定作業 X.Union(Z)。也會傳回 IsSubsetOf(Y)`true`因為的兩個空的權限是空的權限。If Z is also an empty permission, the compound set operation X.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the of two empty permissions is an empty permission.

exception.span: 目標參數不是 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，而且不是和目前使用權限物件相同類別的執行個體。

summary.span: 傳回值，指定目前的 是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value specifying whether the current is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Union (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Union(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前 和指定之使用權限聯集而成的使用權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 新的使用權限，表示目前 和指定之使用權限的 。

span.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表由目前的所有作業的權限及指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作的聯集的方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Union method. X 和 Y 代表不是物件`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Union(X) 傳回的物件具有相同的 X 值。X.Union(X) returns an object that has the same value as X. - X.Union(Y) 傳回的物件具有 Y.Union(X) 所傳回的物件相同的值。X.Union(Y) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by Y.Union(X). - X.Union (`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)) 會傳回具有相同的 X 值的物件。X.Union(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns an object that has the same value as X.

span.span: parameter is invalid.
